intent_atoms.description: Coordinate upcoming C10 (stco/co64) parser work with the new stsz/stz2 sample size tables so validation can reconcile counts across the stsc detail model.
Validation must reconcile counts across the stsc detail model using the new stsz/stz2 sample size tables.
Evaluate additional handler type categorizations if future boxes require specialized roles beyond the current mapping set.
Schedule macOS CLI/UI large-file benchmark execution using the R4 protocol once dedicated hardware runners come online.
Benchmarks must be executed on macOS CLI/UI with the R4 protocol and dedicated hardware runners.
Execute macOS DocC generation, notarization, TestFlight export, and hardware-dependent QA once runners are available, following the release readiness runbook.
DocC generation, notarization, TestFlight export, and hardware‑dependent QA must be completed according to the release readiness runbook.
Execute the random slice benchmark suite on macOS hardware once Combine support is available so we can compare mapped vs. chunked readers under identical workloads.
Random slice benchmark suite must be executed on macOS with Combine support and results compared between mapped and chunked readers.
Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS hardware with XCTest UI support to validate the end‑to‑e­...
